articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: The 66 words Celtic dedicated to confirming Jota's departure from the club was far from representative of the impact he made at the club across two seasons which brought 83 games, 28 goals, 26 assists and five trophies.
articles.title: How do Celtic replace Jota - sensible deal, 66-word club statement, the stats six options or new signing

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: So far, more than 40 transfer deals have been completed by Scottish Premiership clubs as they prepare for the start of the new campaign, whether it be the Viaplay Cup group stages, the league season and Europe. Yet, what is perhaps more intriguing, are the stars who have been linked with a move away or face an uncertain future at their clubs. The Scotsman takes a look at six such individuals ...
articles.title: 6 Premiership stars to watch in the transfer window - Celtic, Hearts and Rangers trio attracting interest

articles.author: Joel Sked
articles.description: There is just over a month until the start of the new Scottish Premiership and less than two weeks until the Viaplay Cup group stages get under way. Clubs have been working on the field and also building a squad for the upcoming campaign. Both continue apace...
articles.title: Scottish transfers: Rangers near €5m target, second could follow, Celtic to lose star man, Hearts winger blow

articles.author: Mark Atkinson
articles.description: Odin Thiago Holm has revealed a visit to Brendan Rodgers’ holiday house in Mallorca helped him feel right at home after joining Celtic from Valerenga.
articles.title: Odin Thiago Holm lifts lid on meeting Brendan Rodgers at Mallorca home after joining Celtic

articles.description: The transfer window is in full swing, with a big-money move for Celtic forward Jota to Al-Ittihad expected to be confirmed in the coming days.
